title: wine_Roessler_2004_Wiley_Vineyard_Riesling_(Anderson_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 28134.
country: US.
description: Far better known as a Pinot Noir producer, Roessler has released this dry Riesling from 25-year-old vines, and it's a terrifically interesting, distinctive California white wine. At 4 years of age, it's bone dry, showing crisp, vibrant Anderson Valley acidity, and is showing the oily, diesel, peach, honeysuckle and hazelnut flavors of a maturing, Alsatian-style Riesling. Should continue to develop bottle complexity for another decade..
designation: Wiley Vineyard.
points: 90.
price: 18.0.
province: California.
